00021 #include "calvin_files/converters/utils/test/ConverterFileUtilsTest.h"
00022 //
00023 #include "calvin_files/converters/utils/src/ConverterFileUtils.h"
00024 //
00025 #include "util/Fs.h"
00026 //
00027 #include <cstdio>
00028 #include <fstream>

00030 
00031 using namespace std;
00032 
00033 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( ConverterFileUtilsTest );
00034 
00035 
00036 void ConverterFileUtilsTest::setUp()
00037 {
00038         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ConverterRemoveFile("busy") == true);
00039         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ConverterRemoveFile("busy2") == true);
00040 }
00041 
00042 void ConverterFileUtilsTest::tearDown()
00043 {
00044         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ConverterRemoveFile("busy") == true);
00045         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ConverterRemoveFile("busy2") == true);
00046 }
00047 
00048 void ConverterFileUtilsTest::testMove()
00049 {
00050         ofstream str("busy", ios::out);
00051         str << "busy" << endl;
00052         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ConverterFileExists("busy") == true);
00053 #ifdef WIN32
00054         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ConverterMoveFile("busy", "busy2", false) == false);
00055 #endif
00056         str.close();
00057         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ConverterMoveFile("busy", "busy2", false) == true);
00058         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ConverterFileExists("busy2") == true);
00059         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ConverterFileExists("busy") == false);
00060 
00061         Fs::aptOpen(str, "busy", ios::out);
00062         str << "busy" << endl;
00063         str.close();
00064         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ConverterMoveFile("busy2", "busy", false) == false);
00065         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ConverterMoveFile("busy2", "busy", true) == true);
00066 }
00067 
00068 void ConverterFileUtilsTest::testRemove()
00069 {
00070         ofstream str("busy", ios::out);
00071         str << "busy" << endl;
00072         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ConverterFileExists("busy") == true);
00073 #ifdef WIN32
00074         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ConverterRemoveFile("busy") == false);
00075 #endif
00076         str.close();
00077         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ConverterRemoveFile("busy") == true);
00078         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ConverterFileExists("busy") == false);
00079 }
00080 
00081 void ConverterFileUtilsTest::testExists()
00082 {
00083         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ConverterFileExists("ConverterFileUtilsTest.cpp") == true);
00084         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ConverterFileExists("ConverterFileUtilsTest.no_file") == false);
00085 }
